faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about ReviewInsight

items.title: How does ReviewInsight analyze app reviews?
items.description: ReviewInsight uses advanced AI and natural language processing to analyze reviews from app stores (App Store, Google Play). Our algorithms identify sentiment, extract key themes, detect pain points, and surface actionable insights from millions of user reviews in real-time.

items.title: Can I analyze any app, including competitors?
items.description: Yes! You can analyze any publicly available app on major app stores. This includes your own apps, competitor apps, and any app you're curious about. Our system works with apps across all categories.

items.title: What makes the AI chat feature special?
items.description: Unlike traditional analytics dashboards, our AI chat lets you have natural conversations about your data. Ask questions like 'What do users hate most about the checkout process?' or 'How does our app compare to competitors?' The AI understands context, remembers your conversation, and can dig deeper into specific insights based on your questions.

items.title: How accurate is the sentiment analysis?
items.description: Our AI models achieve 94%+ accuracy in sentiment analysis, trained on millions of app reviews across different languages and contexts. We use ensemble methods combining multiple AI models and continuously improve accuracy through machine learning. The system also handles sarcasm, context, and nuanced expressions that traditional tools miss.

items.title: Do you support multiple languages?
items.description: Yes! ReviewInsight supports 25+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, and more. Our AI automatically detects the language and provides insights in your preferred language, making it perfect for global apps and international market analysis.

items.title: How often is the data updated?
items.description: Review data is updated in real-time as new reviews are published. Our system continuously monitors app stores and social platforms, typically capturing new reviews within 5-15 minutes of publication. This ensures you always have the latest insights and can quickly respond to emerging issues or trends.
